sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Users, FileText, TrendingUp, AlertCircle, CheckCircle, Clock, DollarSign, BarChart3 } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = () => { const stats = [ { name: 'Total Beneficiaries', value: '12,847', change: '+12%', changeType: 'increase', icon: Users, color: 'bg-blue-500' }, { name: 'Active Schemes', value: '24', change: '+2', changeType: 'increase', icon: FileText, color: 'bg-green-500' }, { name: 'Audits Completed', value: '156', change: '+8%', changeType: 'increase', icon: CheckCircle, color: 'bg-purple-500' }, { name: 'Pending Reviews', value: '23', change: '-5', changeType: 'decrease', icon: Clock, color: 'bg-orange-500' } ]; const recentAudits = [ { id: 1, scheme: 'Pre-Matric Scholarship', location: 'Mumbai District', status: 'Completed', date: '2024-01-15', auditor: 'Rajesh Kumar' }, { id: 2, scheme: 'Post-Matric Scholarship', location: 'Delhi NCR', status: 'In Progress', date: '2024-01-14', auditor: 'Priya Sharma' }, { id: 3, scheme: 'Skill Development Program', location: 'Bangalore Urban', status: 'Pending', date: '2024-01-13', auditor: 'Mohammed Ali' } ]; const alerts = [ { id: 1, type: 'warning', message: 'Scholarship disbursement delayed in 3 districts', time: '2 hours ago' }, { id: 2, type: 'info', message: 'New audit guidelines published', time: '1 day ago' }, { id: 3, type: 'success', message: 'Monthly report submitted successfully', time: '2 days ago' } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Social Audit Dashboard

Department of Minority Welfare - Monitoring and Evaluation System

{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat) => { const Icon = stat.icon; return (
{stat.changeType === 'increase' ? '↗' : '↘'}

{stat.name}

{stat.value}

{stat.change} from last month
); })}
{/* Recent Audits */}

Recent Audits

{recentAudits.map((audit) => (

{audit.scheme}

{audit.location}

Auditor: {audit.auditor}

{audit.status}

{audit.date}

))}
{/* Alerts & Notifications */}

Alerts & Notifications

{alerts.map((alert) => (

{alert.message}

{alert.time}

))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default Dashboard;
